name: CluedUpp Detective
description:
CluedUpp design murder-mystery events and games all over the World, allowing small teams to put their sleuthing skills to the test...

Using our award-winning app, teams hunt all over their chosen city, finding virtual witnesses, eliminating suspects and bringing the killer to justice. Can you solve the clues in time?

This is just like real-life Cluedo, so get your magnifying glass ready and see your favourite city in a new and exciting way.

To find your nearest game, please visit www.CluedUpp.com
